name: Bongo's Adventure
description:
Short 2D platformer. There are two traps and one enemy. You can finish the game in 2-5 minutes.

Controls

Movement: WASDJumping: SPACESleeping: FExit: ESCBack to menu: BACKSPACERestart the part: R

Credits

https://elthen.itch.io/2d-pixel-art-cat-sprites for cat sprite

https://szadiart.itch.io/bakcground-hill for background

https://zakiro101.itch.io/free-casual-game-music-pack-vol-2 for musics

https://thkaspar.itch.io/tth-animals for mouse sprite

Thank you all.
